body:
This will allow users to specify a hard constraint on a single provider of a virtual packages:
```
packages:
  mpi:
    buildable: false
  mpich:
    buildable: true
```
or
```
$ spack config add packages:mpi:buildable:false
$ spack config add packages:mpich:buildable:true
```
title: package preferences: allow specs to be configured buildable when their virtuals are not
